original_text: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
korean_text: 오히려 너희가 그리스도의 고난에 참여하는 것으로 즐거워하라 이는 그의 영광을 나타내실 때에 너희로 즐거워하고 기뻐하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings
that, when his glory shall be revealed
ye may be glad also with exceeding joy
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 지극한 기쁨으로 기뻐하게 하려 함이라
